DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics sequential ascend dos JTK-853 administer 14 day healthy subject also determine effect single dose ketoconazole steady-state pharmacokinetic profile JTK-853 metabolite M2 ( one cohort ) .
DOC.brief_title: Two Week Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses JTK-853 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥18.0 kg/m2 ≤30.0 kg/m2 2 . Nonsmokers subject stop smoke least 6 month prior Screening Visit 3 . Female subject must either surgically sterile postmenopausal 1 . History presence cardiac disease , include family history longQT syndrome unexplained sudden death 2 . Have use prescription medication , herbal product , overthecounter ( OTC ) medication ( except acetaminophen ) within four week prior Day 1
